title: Delhi's Air Quality Turns Poor, Slowdown In Auto Industry Continues And Other Top News
text:
Ahead of the onset of the winters the air quality in the national capital and adjoining area have begun dipping.

On Thursday, for the first time in more than three months, the air quality of Delhi was above 200, which is categorized as 'poor'. Read more

Indian Auto Industry Continues To Suffer As Sale Of Vehicles Falls For Successive 11th Month

Things are not looking bright in the Indian automobile industry, it has not been for some time now. The latest figures are also not promising, as it showed yet another month of the slowdown.

Don't Miss 2 K SHARES 151 SHARES

Industry data from the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) for September showed that passenger vehicle sales plunged by 23.69 percent. During the same time period, commercial vehicle sales were down by 62.11 per cent. Read more

Bride-To-Be Doctor Riding Pillion Crushed To Death In Thane By A Truck After Bikes Skids In Pothole

In a horrific incident, a 25-year-old doctor from Thane was killed after she was run over by a truck as she fell off a two-wheeler after it slipped on a pothole.

The incident happened on the Bhiwandi-Wada road late on Wednesday when Neha Shaikh, a resident of Palghar on her way home with her cousin. Read more

Even As India Awaits His Extradition, CBI Wants PNB Scam Accused Mehul Choksi To Be Declared Proclaimed Offender

The Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) has moved court with a plea to declare fugitive businessman Mehul Choksi, one of the main accused in the multi-crore Punjab National Bank (PNB) scam accused a proclaimed offender.

On Thursday, while moving the plea before the special judge for CBI cases VC Barde, the agency said Choksi left the country even before the first FIR was filed in the case to "conceal himself". Read more

Dead Fish Seen Floating In Coimbatore Lake. This Shows How Much We Are Ruining Our Environment

We have been harming our environment for quite sometime now. Be it plastic usage or polluting our precious water bodies, we have been doing it with much finesse. Data suggests that we might run out of water soon given the lack of rains.

We hardly have water bodies and the ones we have are already dead or polluted. Pictures of dead fish floating were seen floating in Valankulam Lake in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. Read more

4-Year-Old Girl Child Allegedly Raped By Neighbour In MP

A 4-year-old girl was allegedly raped by her 30-year-old neighbour in Guna, Madhya Pradesh. An FIR has been registered and the accused has been arrested, police said.

Not only this incident, a day ago, police arrested a man for allegedly raping an 8-year-old girl in Daudpur area of Alwar after the incident was caught on the CCTV camera installed in the region. Read more
